EmailTemplate.textOnly:
MEET UP WITH YOUR TEAM THIS WEEKEND AND WIN A MEAL OUT FOR ALL OF YOU
Hi, {!Contact.FirstName}
Are you going to the Big Reunion on Saturday?
The Challenge are hosting a Festival on Saturday in West Thames College and we want you and all your mates from the summer to get back together and relive a fantastic summer.
We want to see as many of Team {!Wave_Selection__c.Assigned_team_name__c} as possible back together. If 8 or more people from your Team {!Wave_Selection__c.Assigned_team_name__c} are there then you get entered into a draw. The winning Team get a meal out on the Challenge.
To get your name on on the guest list email me back or log on to you Challenge Society page and click attending.
See you Saturday.....
